law.text: All full-time vacancies shall be posted in all schools and offices ten (10) days prior to filling a certified or equivalent position in the classified section of the personnel system contained in KRS 156.800 to 156.860.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 8, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 475, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1994.
